name: Nythyhel
overview: This adventure formed the basis of Tony Collins' later games Methyhel and Methyhel - The Special Edition. Essentially, you are a P.I. who specializes in the world of the occult. The story starts with you in your office where you have to piece together the information found in the envelope on your desk. The main puzzles in Part I are broken down into finding out where to go, an interesting concept, but a sometimes tedious one.
